title: Software Engineer Position
description: We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have experience with:
niceToHave: CI/CD pipeline setup with GitHub Actions
responsibilities: Develop and maintain scalable web applications
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
benefits: We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth in a collaborative environment.
fullText:
We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have experience with:

Required Skills:
- Node.js and JavaScript/TypeScript
- React.js and modern frontend frameworks
- RESTful API development and integration
- Database design and management (PostgreSQL preferred)
- Version control with Git
- Agile/Scrum methodologies
- Unit testing and test-driven development

Nice to Have:
- AWS cloud services (Lambda, EC2, S3)
- Docker containerization
- CI/CD pipeline setup with GitHub Actions
- Microservices architecture
- GraphQL

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain scalable web applications
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
- Troubleshoot and debug applications

We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth in a collaborative environment.
